meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the August 27, 2024 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Consider and approve qualifications and appointment of Aaron Eaquinto
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve the qualifications and appointment of Aaron Eaquinto to the position of General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for Tenison Lofts
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt resolutions for the financing, acquisition, and construction of Tenison Lofts.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Jefferson Innova
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution for the acquisition, financing, and operation of Jefferson Innova.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Oak & Ellum
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution for the acquisition, financing, and operation of Oak & Ellum.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for The Legacy on Kiest
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt an inducement resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to LDG The Legacy on Kiest.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for Palladium Buckner Station
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt an inducement resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to Palladium Buckner Station.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Treasurer’s report for the seven-month period ending on July 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of September 3, 2024.

financial_items.description: Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for The Legacy on Kiest
